text: Photos Photos: OPETH At Kings Theatre Photos Photos: SEPULTURA, OBITUARY, AGNOSTIC FRONT & CLAUSTROFOBIA At The Palladium Photos Photos: JINJER At Danforth Music Hall Photos Photos: THE BLACK DAHLIA MURDER, DYING FETUS, ANGELMAKER, SPITE & VOMIT FORTH At The Rave Photos Photos: NERVOSA, HATRIOT & LICH KING At Brooklyn Meadows Photos Shout out to photographer Smitty Neal.
